hero.image_alt: High-quality meat served in a gourmet dinner setting
hero.title: PREMIUM QUALITY MEAT
hero.description: We select only the finest cuts for a unique culinary experience.

afterHero.image_right_alt: Happy person in a pleasant setting
afterHero.title: WE OFFER QUALITY PRODUCTS AT BENITO, YOU’LL DISCOVER THE TRUE FLAVOR OF OUR MEAT.

calidad.title: GUARANTEED QUALITY
calidad.description: We carefully select and inspect every batch to ensure freshness and traceability from origin.

procesos.title: CLEAN PROCESSES
procesos.description: We comply with strict sanitary and food safety protocols at every stage of production.

logistica.title: EFFICIENT LOGISTICS
logistica.description: On-time, flexible deliveries with a controlled cold chain to preserve flavor.

res.title: Beef
res.description: Selected cuts, ready for grill or barbecue.

cerdo.title: Pork
cerdo.description: Juicy and tender, perfect for barbecue.

pollo.title: Fresh Chicken
pollo.description: Lean and versatile, ideal for light recipes.

otros.title: Artisanal Sausages
otros.description: A curated selection of cured and smoked products.

promoHero.image_alt: Professional food presentation with focus on the center
promoHero.title: PERFECT FOOD, PROFESSIONAL SERVICE
promoHero.description: We are specialized suppliers dedicated to distributing high-quality meats in bulk. Our mission is to ensure freshness, reliability, and consistent supply for restaurants, hotels, and businesses across the country.

contactSection.title: Contact Us
contactSection.description: If you have questions, comments, or need assistance, send us a message. Our team will be happy to help.

form.success: Message sent successfully. Thank you for contacting us!

footer.blurb: We offer fresh and frozen products of the highest quality with personalized service.

r1.title: ABSOLUTELY DELIGHTED!
r1.body: The quality and flavor are consistent with every delivery. Perfect for my restaurant.
r1.name: — Andrea L.

r2.title: IMPECCABLE SERVICE
r2.body: Impeccable attention and precise cuts. You can tell they care about every step.
r2.name: — Carlos M.

r3.title: ALWAYS FRESH
r3.body: Always fresh, well-packed, and delivered at the right temperature.
r3.name: — Fernanda R.

r4.title: INTENSE FLAVORS
r4.body: Bold flavors and perfectly prepared cuts. My customers love it.
r4.name: — Jorge R.

login.title: Log In to Comment
login.intro: Enter your real name to display it as the review author.

errors.fill_all: Please fill out all fields correctly.

messages.invalid_form: Please make sure you’re logged in, entered a title, and wrote at least 5 words.
